mainContent.content: Founded by ThoughtWorks Alums - Pioneers of agile way of software development
Real world Organisation Projects that helps build strong foundational skills
Placement in well funded, tech-startups looking for quality talent

Emerging Startups: Opportunity to get placed directly in the startup
Community: Become Part of a community of developers
Support in overall growth and aspects of Career
Others: Learn best practises in development and testing
